products.name: Trek Domane AL 2
products.description: Perfect for road rides, races, and fondos
products.fullDescription: Domane AL 2 is a beast of a value for a road bike. It's a lightweight aluminum road bike with a dependable 105 drivetrain and a ride quality that exceeds bikes twice its price. It's the perfect choice for your first road bike or for a high-value upgrade to your current ride.

products.name: Specialized Allez
products.description: Fast, efficient, and built for performance
products.fullDescription: The Allez is the perfect entry point for faster road riding. With its lightweight aluminum frame and reliable components, it delivers speed and efficiency without breaking the bank.

products.name: Giant Talon 2
products.description: Trail-ready mountain bike for any adventure
products.fullDescription: Built on a lightweight ALUXX aluminum frame, Talon features updated geometry that produces a fast, stable ride on roads and trails. The frame is optimized for 27.5-inch wheels, offering a balance of agility and control.

products.name: Cannondale Trail 5
products.description: Versatile mountain bike for trails and paths
products.fullDescription: The Trail 5 features a smart-sized wheel platform for the perfect fit and performance. With capable components and reliable construction, this bike is ready for your off-road adventures.

products.name: Trek FX 3
products.description: Versatile hybrid for fitness and commuting
products.fullDescription: FX 3 is a versatile hybrid bike with a lightweight aluminum frame and performance parts. It's perfect for fitness, commuting, or recreational rides on various surfaces.

products.name: Giant Explore E+ 2
products.fullDescription: Explore E+ 2 features a powerful SyncDrive motor and EnergyPak battery for extended range. Perfect for commuting, fitness rides, or weekend adventures.

products.name: Specialized Turbo Vado 3.0
products.description: Premium electric bike for urban commuting
products.fullDescription: The Turbo Vado 3.0 features a custom motor and battery for smooth, quiet power delivery. With integrated lights and rack, it's the ultimate urban commuter.

products.name: Trek Precaliber 20
products.description: Perfect first bike for young riders
products.fullDescription: Precaliber 20 is a kid's bike designed for building confidence and skills. With lightweight construction and quality components, it makes learning to ride fun and easy.
